q1.question: How are matches chosen?
q1.answer: Our algorithms take into account your preferences, interests and location to suggest a relevant match every day.

q2.question: What happens after 24h?
q2.answer: If you both decide to continue, the conversation stays open without limit. Otherwise, you each receive a new match the next day.

q3.question: Is the app free?
q3.answer: Tandem is free in its basic version. Premium features will be available to enhance your experience.

q4.question: How do you ensure safety?
q4.answer: We verify all profiles, have a reporting system and moderate content to ensure a safe environment.

q5.question: When will the app be available?
q5.answer: We're in private beta phase. Sign up for the waitlist to be notified of the launch.
